original_title: Singer leads 5G Era in Sri Lanka with HONOR
original_body_lines: Singer Sri Lanka PLC has further strengthened its leadership in the mobile phone market with the exclusive launch of two new 5G-enabled smartphones from HONOR; the Honor 200 Smart 5G and Honor X9C Smart 5G. This launch not only marks a major step forward in making next-generation mobile connectivity accessible to Sri Lankans but also reinforces Singer’s position as the nation’s leading and most reliable destination for 5G smartphones.

Positioned among the country’s most affordable and accessible 5G smartphones, the launch of the new HONOR devices marks a significant milestone in making next-generation technology more accessible to Sri Lankans.

The Honor 200 Smart 5G, priced at Rs. 69,999, is a stylish, powerful, and value-driven device. It comes equipped with a long-lasting battery, 256GB of storage, and a fluid 120Hz display, delivering impressive performance and everyday versatility. Meanwhile, the Honor X9C Smart 5G, priced at Rs. 99,999, combines a premium design with robust specifications at a competitive mid-range price. It features a high-resolution 108MP camera, 12GB of RAM, a vivid 120Hz display, and extended battery life making it an ideal choice for users seeking cutting-edge performance at a compelling price point.
